review: VOICE SEARCH ONLY SEARCHES AMAZON CONTENT. I have had both Apple TV and Roku. I was an early adopter of Apple TV but their first generation didn't include Hulu streaming so I bought a Roku. I got tired of having both devices so I looked at a new Apple TV, a new Roku or Amazon's Fire. I chose the Amazon product because it seemed to offer more features. I was sorry to find out that the VOICE SEARCH ONLY SEARCHES AMAZON CONTENT, not Netflix or other content providers. To search those provider's content, you have to navigate to that provider and then use the clunky search tool of typing in a letter at a time with your remote. This limitation on the voice search IS NOT COMMUNICATED IN THEIR PRODUCT ADVERTISEMENT. If I am mistaken or not using the device properly, I would love to know Amazon.

review: This Fire TV is a bit more substantial and gets a stronger signal for me than my Fire Stick.  I don't think anyone would be disappointed in either unit. I love them both.
